class_notes: Examines the broad scope of women's history in Russia from the medieval period to the present.  Emphasizes women's role as agents in a profoundly patriarchal society.
course_description:
Jr/Sr Colloquium. 
Concentrate on the experience of women across the broad scope of Russian history. Will investigate women's roles in the Russian aristocracy, serfdom, revolutionary movement, Communist state and post-Soviet embrace of capitalism and gender subordination.
sections: Class Nbr: 3919, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 1-3:45p, Instructor: M. Payne, Status: Open
